author: "Momoko Price"
date: "9/27/2017"
output: html_document
---


Move your mouse over each marker to see the name of each wonder and what country they're in. There are seven in total. 

```{r load_data, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)

seven_wonders <- data.frame(
  Site = c("Catacombs of Kom el Shoqafa", "Colosseum", "Great Wall of China", "Hagia Sophia", "Leaning Tower of Pisa", "Porcelain Tower of Nanjing", "Stonehenge"), 
  Lat = c(31.206074,41.8902102,40.4319077,41.008583,43.722952,32.014203,51.17888199999999), 
  Lng = c(29.881599,12.4922309,116.5703749,28.980175,10.396597,118.775852,-1.826215),
  Wiki = c("https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Catacombs_of_Kom_El_Shoqafa", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colosseum", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Great_Wall_of_China", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hagia_Sophia", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leaning_Tower_of_Pisa", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Porcelain_Tower_of_Nanjing", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stonehenge"),
  Img = c("<img src='https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/85/113KOM_EL_SHOQAFA_CATACOMBS.jpg/1200px-113KOM_EL_SHOQAFA_CATACOMBS.jpg' alt='113KOM EL SHOQAFA CATACOMBS.jpg' width='200'>", 
            "<img src='https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/53/Colosseum_in_Rome%2C_Italy_-_April_2007.jpg/1200px-Colosseum_in_Rome%2C_Italy_-_April_2007.jpg' alt='Colosseum in Rome, Italy - April 2007.jpg' width='200'>", 
            "<img src='https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/23/The_Great_Wall_of_China_at_Jinshanling-edit.jpg/1200px-The_Great_Wall_of_China_at_Jinshanling-edit.jpg' alt='The Great Wall of China at Jinshanling-edit.jpg' width='200'>", 
            "<img src='https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/22/Hagia_Sophia_Mars_2013.jpg/1200px-Hagia_Sophia_Mars_2013.jpg' alt='Hagia Sophia Mars 2013.jpg' width='200'>", 
            "<img src='https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/66/The_Leaning_Tower_of_Pisa_SB.jpeg/1200px-The_Leaning_Tower_of_Pisa_SB.jpeg' alt='The Leaning Tower of Pisa SB.jpeg' width='200'>", 
            "<img src='https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9a/UB_Maastricht_-_Nieuhof_1665_-_Toren.jpg/1200px-UB_Maastricht_-_Nieuhof_1665_-_Toren.jpg' alt='UB Maastricht - Nieuhof 1665 - Toren.jpg' width='200'>", 
            "<img src='https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/3c/Stonehenge2007_07_30.jpg/1200px-Stonehenge2007_07_30.jpg' alt='Stonehenge2007 07 30.jpg' width='200'>"),
  Location = c("Alexandria, Egypt", 
               "Rome, Italy",
               "China",
               "Istanbul, Turkey",
               "Pisa, Italy",
               "Nanjing, China",
               "Wiltshire, England")
  ) %>%
  mutate(Content = paste(Img, "<br><br><strong>", Site, "</strong><br>", Location, "<br><a href='", Wiki, "'>Click to learn more</a>", sep=""))
```


```{r leaflet, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}

library(leaflet)
seven_wonders_map <- seven_wonders %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(popup=seven_wonders$Content)

seven_wonders_map
```
